description: Manufacturing and construction workers can return to work, but other people must remain at home.
title: Coronavirus: Spain begins to ease lockdown to revive economy
title_page: Coronavirus: Spain begins to ease lockdown to revive economy - BBC News
maintext: He also noted that Spain had not entered the "second phase" of the fight against the coronavirus, when there would be any further loosening of the lockdown. That was at least two weeks away and would "be very gradual", he added.
